actions.committee: House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Standards of Official Conduct.

official_title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit honoraria for Members, officers, and employees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Amends rule XLIII of the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit the amount any Member, officer, or employee may accept as an honorarium for any single activity, or in the aggregate during a single calendar year.

titles.title: Resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to limit honoraria for Members, officers, and employees of the House of Representatives.
